summary: Experienced and result-oriented Software Engineer with +6 years of experience. I successfully collaborate with my team to get things done to achieve and overcome the established objectives and goals.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsabilities: Migrate the shopping flow of the application with the usage of new technologies based on web components and flux architecture.
Work on the loyalty service of the application, the most valuable feature for the business, creating promotions for flights, rooms, cars, and activities.
Participate in the creation and maintain room connectors that generate more than $2M in annual recurring revenue for Switchfly.
Write automated tests of the created features or updates.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsabilities: Worked on an application based on micro-services architecture, mainly focus on front-end tasks using Angular JS.
Implementation of a performance testing module written on Node.js.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsabilities: Participate as mentor of several new joined engineers and interns.
Maintainer of an internal application to manage workshops and budget for internal training.
Collaborate on the development of a tool for conducting retrospective meetings, which is the most profitable product in SoftwareDevTools, corresponding to more than 65% of the sales.
Actively participate in events hosted by Nearsoft, which are aimed to encourage the software development culture in the community.
Currently interviewing new intern candidates for the Academy program.

experience.title: Web developer
responsabilities: Create Wordpress themes for several clients for their websites.
Create responsive websites based on custom web designs.
